#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /* 
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format 
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  */
  /* your code here */
  RaftServer& raftServer = GetRaftServer();
  Log_info("(KVPUT0) called for kvServer=%d, key=%s, val=%s", raftServer.loc_id_, k, v);

  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);

  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);


  bool_t isLeader = false;
  uint64_t* index= new uint64_t();
  uint64_t* term = new uint64_t();

  isLeader = raftServer.Start(cmd, index, term);
  if(!isLeader) return KV_NOTLEADER;
  else {
    auto coro = Coroutine::CurrentCoroutine();
    Log_info("Current coro = %s kvserver=%d", coro, raftServer.loc_id_);
    coro->Sleep(1000 * 500);
  }



  if((*processedQueries).count(to_string(oid)) <= 0) return KV_TIMEOUT;
  
  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
  
  RaftServer& raftServer = GetRaftServer();
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("append");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);

  Log_info("(KVAPPEND0) called for kvServer=%d, key=%s, val=%s", raftServer.loc_id_, k, v);

  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd =  dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
  bool_t isLeader = false;
  uint64_t* index= new uint64_t();
  uint64_t* term = new uint64_t();

  isLeader = raftServer.Start(cmd, index, term);
  if(!isLeader) return KV_NOTLEADER;
  else {
    auto coro = Coroutine::CurrentCoroutine();
    Log_info("Current coro = %s kvserver=%d", coro, raftServer.loc_id_);
    coro->Sleep(1000 * 500);
  }

  Log_info("(KVAPPEND1) called for kvServer=%d, key=%s, val=%s", raftServer.loc_id_, k, v);

  if((*processedQueries).count(to_string(oid)) <= 0) return KV_TIMEOUT;


  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */
  RaftServer& raftServer = GetRaftServer();
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  
  Log_info("(KVGET0) called for kvServer=%d, key=%s, val=%s", raftServer.loc_id_, k, v);
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
  bool_t isLeader = false;
  uint64_t* index= new uint64_t();
  uint64_t* term = new uint64_t();

 isLeader = raftServer.Start(cmd, index, term);
  if(!isLeader) return KV_NOTLEADER;
  else {
    auto coro = Coroutine::CurrentCoroutine();
    Log_info("Current coro = %s kvserver=%d", coro, raftServer.loc_id_);
    coro->Sleep(1000 * 500);
  }

  *v = (*map)[k];
  Log_info("(KVGET1) called for kvServer=%d, key=%s, val=%s", raftServer.loc_id_, k, v);

  if((*processedQueries).count(to_string(oid)) <= 0) return KV_TIMEOUT;
  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  auto commands = v->data_;
  string cmdType = commands[1];
  RaftServer& raftServer = GetRaftServer();
  (*processedQueries).insert(commands[0]);
  if(cmdType == "put") {
    Log_info("(OnNextCommand PUT) called for kvServer=%d type=APPEND", raftServer.loc_id_);
    string key = commands[2];
    (*map)[key] = commands[3];
  } else if (cmdType == "append") {
    Log_info("(OnNextCommand APPEND) called for kvServer=%d type=PUT", raftServer.loc_id_);
    string key = commands[2];
   (*map)[key] += commands[3];
  } else {
    Log_info("(OnNextCommand GET) called for kvServer=%d type=GET", raftServer.loc_id_);
  }
  /* your code here */
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
